text:
@realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC Money isn’t everything when there are lives at stake.
Trump considers money, the stock market and his personal finances not American lives as important to him and his rich friends. That’s why he has done little to prevent the spread of Covid19 and why we have the highest deaths
